quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended—and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
quotes.author: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Family faces are magic mirrors. Looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present, and future.
quotes.author: Gail Lumet Buckley

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Family is the most important institution in society.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: Having a place to go is a home. Having someone to love is a family. Having both is a blessing.
quotes.author: Donna Hedges

quotes.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The family – that dear octopus from whose tentacles we never quite escape, nor, in our inmost hearts, ever quite wish to.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that it is around the family and the home that all the greatest virtues, the most dominating virtues of human, are created, strengthened and maintained.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In time of test, family is best.
quotes.author: Burmese Proverb

quotes.quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one's life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The informality of family life is a blessed condition that allows us to become our best while looking our worst.
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: Family is family, and is not determined by marriage certificates, divorce papers, and adoption documents.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: In family relationships, love is really spelled T-I-M-E.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: A family in harmony will prosper in everything.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: Stick to the basics, hold on to your family and friends – they will never go out of fashion.
quotes.author: Niki Taylor

quotes.quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If the family were a fruit, it would be an orange, a circle of sections, held together but separable — each segment distinct.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: The family is a haven in a heartless world.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: Our most basic instinct is not for survival but for family.
quotes.author: Paul Pearsall

quotes.quote: Families are like fudge – mostly sweet with a few nuts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching – they are your family.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Where there is family, there is love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: A dysfunctional family is any family with more than one person in it.
quotes.author: Mary Karr

quotes.quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Lisa Weed

quotes.quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The family is the school of duties – founded on love.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.quote: No family is perfect... we argue, we fight. We even stop talking to each other at times. But in the end, family is family... The love will always be there.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
quotes.author: Mark V. Olsen

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guides us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there anymore.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Ohana means family. Family means nobody gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: Lilo & Stitch

quotes.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Families are messy. Immortal families are eternally messy. Sometimes the best we can do is to remind each other that we're related for better or for worse... and try to keep the maiming and killing to a minimum.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: When we have each other, we have everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Home is where my habits have a habitat.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: I don't care how poor a man is; if he has family, he's rich.
quotes.author: Dan Wilcox

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: The memories we make with our family is everything.
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.quote: Family is not defined by our genes, it is built and maintained through love.
quotes.author: Amalia G.

quotes.quote: The homemaker has the ultimate career. All other careers exist for one purpose only - and that is to support the ultimate career.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A mother is a person who, seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.author: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.quote: Family isn't always blood. It's the people in your life who want you in theirs; the ones who accept you for who you are.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Home is where you feel at home and are treated well.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Blood makes you related. Loyalty makes you family.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.quote: You are born into your family and your family is born into you. No returns. No exchanges.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Home isn't where you're from, it's where you find light when all grows dark.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The world, we'd discovered, doesn't love you like your family loves you.
quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

quotes.quote: Family: a unit composed not only of children, but of men, women, an occasional animal, and the common cold.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Spare the rod and spoil the child – that is true. But, beside the rod, keep an apple to give him when he has done well.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Family is where life begins and love never ends.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: A house is built by hands, but a home is built by heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: The greatest moments in life are not concerned with selfish achievements but rather with the things we do for the people we love and esteem.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.quote: There's nothing that makes you more insane than family.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: The capacity for friendship is God's way of apologizing for our families.
quotes.author: Jay McInerney

quotes.quote: I have a wonderful shelter, which is my family.
quotes.author: José Carreras

quotes.quote: A house is made of walls and beams; a home is built with love and dreams.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: The family. We are a strange little band of characters trudging through life sharing diseases and toothpaste, coveting one another's desserts, hiding shampoo, borrowing money, locking each other out of our rooms.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.quote: Govern a family as you would cook a small fish — very gently.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
quotes.author: Ring Lardner

quotes.quote: A little too much is just enough for me.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: A home filled with nothing but yourself. It's heavy, that lightness. It's crushing, that emptiness.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Home is the nicest word there is.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: The way you help heal a broken family is to sit down and talk.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you're going, it's who you have beside you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We may have our differences, but nothing's more important than family.
quotes.author: Coco

quotes.quote: God gives us relatives; thank God we can choose our friends.
quotes.author: Ethel Mumford

quotes.quote: Family life is too intimate to be preserved by the spirit of justice. It can be sustained by a spirit of love which goes beyond justice.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: Home should be an anchor, a port in a storm, a refuge, a happy place in which to dwell, a place where we are loved and where we can love.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
quotes.author: Burton Hills

quotes.quote: That's what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you're not so lovable.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: One's family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I'll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who'll be with me will be my family.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Show me a family of readers, and I will show you the people who move the world.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: In a household of toddlers and pets, we discover this rule of thumb about happy families—that they are least truly happy when they are most determined to have a good time.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: There is no cure for laziness but a large family helps.
quotes.author: Herbert Prochnow

quotes.quote: Never let your house be without food.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: No man on his death bed ever looked up into the eyes of his family and friends and said, 'I wish I'd spent more time at the office.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If you look deeply into the palm of your hand, you will see your parents and all generations of your ancestors. All of them are alive in this moment. Each is present in your body. You are the continuation of each of these people.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The advantage of growing up with siblings is that you become very good at sharing.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
quotes.author: Amos Oz

quotes.quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: My mother used to tell me that when push comes to shove, you always know who to turn to. That being a family isn't a social construct but an instinct.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: My dear young cousin, if there's one thing I've learned over the eons, it's that you can't give up on your family, no matter how tempting they make it.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Important families are like potatoes. The best parts are underground.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Family isn't something that's supposed to be static, or set. People marry in, divorce out. They're born, they die. It's always evolving, turning into something else.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I know all those words, but that sentence makes no sense to me.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Human beings are the only creatures on earth that allow their children to come back home.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: That's the best thing about little sisters: They spend so much time wishing they were elder sisters that in the end they're far wiser than the elder ones could ever be.
quotes.author: Gemma Gurgess

quotes.quote: Let us make one point, that we meet each other with a smile, when it is difficult to smile. Smile at each other, make time for each other in your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: My mother was the making of me. She was so true and so sure of me, I felt that I had someone to live for – someone I must not disappoint.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Like all the best families, we have our share of eccentricities, of impetuous and wayward youngsters and of family disagreements.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: The great gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
quotes.author: Kendall Hailey

quotes.quote: No culture can live if it attempts to be exclusive.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: No amount of money or success can take the place of time spent with your family.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Blended families: woven together by choice, strengthened together by love, tested by everything, and each uniquely ours.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Home is a shelter from storms—all sorts of storms.
quotes.author: William J. Bennett

quotes.quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: When you come from a big family, you see that, growing up, you're learning how to share. Your sisters have got your back; you're not alone in this–'We all support you!'
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: Family is supposed to be our safe haven. Very often, it's the place where we find the deepest heartache.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: The one who teaches children learns more than they do.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing purchased can come close to the renewed sense of gratitude for having family and friends.
quotes.author: Courtland Milloy

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: When I was a boy of fourteen, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be twenty-one, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance - waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: We do not develop habits of genuine love automatically. We learn by watching effective role models – most specifically by observing how our parents express love for each other day in and day out.
quotes.author: Josh McDowell

quotes.quote: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Don't think your single act doesn't count. The world is changed by single acts, especially when multiplied by family.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.
quotes.author: Angela Schwindt

quotes.quote: When all the dust is settled and all the crowds are gone, the things that matter are faith, family, and friends.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: A father carries pictures where his money used to be.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are the father, the mother and the teacher.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Give the ones you love wings to fly, roots to come back, and reasons to stay.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.quote: The family is a source of encouragement and comfort in times of personal and social trial.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: You go through life wondering what is it all about but at the end of the day it's all about family.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: A mother discovers with great delight that one does not love one's children just because they are one's children but because of the friendship formed while raising them.
quotes.author: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.quote: The older I get, the smarter my father seems to get.
quotes.author: Tim Russert

quotes.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: People who come from dysfunctional families are not destined for a dysfunctional life.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: I don't know who my grandfather was; I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
